item.description:
Saturday night we will be heading down to New Haven since it's been a while that we've been there. To all of our members in the southern part of the state we hope to see you. We're going to start at 116 Crown Street for 9p.m. and make our way to Bar or another venue in downtown New Haven depending on what everyone wants to do. 116 Crown has a lot of exotic type drinks which are very good along with a chill atomosphere.

 

Looking forward to being in New Haven again and seeing everyone out! Have a great week until then.

Cheers,

John
item.name: 116 Crown/BAR in New Haven!
